name: waihod
description:
HISTORY

In waihod, a planet filled with cute creatures is invaded by another planet, with bad and horrible creatures, your character, is the new hero, and she/he has to use the power to stop time to defeat the monsters.

This is a prototype, some features like are not implemented yet, and there migth be bugs.

the final game will have more maps and levels including final mini bosses and a final boss
